Point

The Point constructor

Name Type Description
x Number

The x value
y Number

Methods

add

Adds a vector to the point.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
v object | Point

The vector to add. Must contain an x and a y property.

The Point instance

Name Type Description

Multiplier

The current Point instance

Type
Point

normalize

Scales the line segment between (0,0) and the current point to a set length.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
length Number

The scaling value
Returns:

The current Point instance

Type
Point

offset

Offsets the Point object by the specified amount. The value of dx is added to the original value of x to create the new x value. The value of dy is added to the original value of y to create the new y value.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
dx Number

The amount by which to offset the horizontal coordinate, x.
dy Number

The amount by which to offset the vertical coordinate, y.
Returns:

The current Point instance

Type
Point

subtract

Subtracts the coordinates of another point from the coordinates of this point to create a new point.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
newPoint Point

The new point.
Returns:

The current Point instance

Type
Point

toArray

Returns a plain array with x and y.

Returns:

an array

Type
Array

toObject

Returns a plain object with x and y.

Returns:

an object

Type
Object

toString

Returns a csv (comma seperated values).

Returns:

a csv
